column4: I have sound with my stereo, I added the 2  lines in the files related to my ICE1712 board.
What I do not understand is why I can only have stereo?
I have a headphone plugged on the output (RCA ) 3 and 4, and only the 1 and 2 (my loudpeakers) work...
pulseaudio only really seems to understand two channels
